      • tagRemoved

        public void tagRemoved(Long removedTagId,
                       Long newTagId,
                       List<Long> followers)
                throws AuthorizationException,
                       TagNotFoundException
        Description copied from interface: FollowManagement
        Method to be called after a tag has been removed or merged with another tag. In case of a merge the provided followers of the old tag will be added as followers to the new tag.
        Parameters:
        removedTagId - the ID of the removed tag
        newTagId - the ID of the tag the old tag was merged into, can be null
        followers - the IDs of the users that followed the old tag
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the calling user is not the internal system user
        TagNotFoundException - in case newTagId is not null but there is no tag for that ID
